issue.title: Issues attempting to replay Gazebo log file

content.raw: After filtering the original log file I was able to run the result on my 8GB ram computer. Of course you may have to reboot Ubuntu before the playback will load correctly. It is amusing to watch the robot pass through the closed door, since the door motion is filtered from the log.
content.html: After filtering the original log file I was able to run the result on my 8GB ram computer. Of course you may have to reboot Ubuntu before the playback will load correctly. It is amusing to watch the robot pass through the closed door, since the door motion is filtered from the log.
